name: DiegoTC Toolbox
description:
Welcome to DiegoTC Toolbox!

This is a Platformer-Puzzle game mashup with tons of level and puzzle variety, and lots of new mechanics to explore!

You play as Diego "The" Cube, through multiple level packs, maybe even finding some other friends along the way?

  • Dodge spikes while you're solving puzzles!
  • Make it to the exit!
  • And beat all the levels!

Please note that there may be some issues or lack-luster levels, I'm only solo! I'm creating this game with only $10 as funding. Buy purchasing the full version or donating, I can hire more people to help get better updates out!

Need a walkthrough? 

You can find More DiegoTC content in my Discord server, announcements and updates will be held there.

https://discord.gg/gtNnbQ
